title: Daltonik
author: Daltonik
created_time: November 07, 2022, 02:05:34 PMLast edit: January 18, 2023, 07:20:40 AM by Daltonik
content: Disclaimer: I am not a member of the development team or its representative, the content is provided solely for the purpose of familiarization, do not forget about the risks and potential consequences of excessive gambling.The First World Cup themed token on Eth, experience the thrill of winning with your favourite teamsAttention On January 3, a swap of $WCI tokens for $BCB was made, do not buy $WCI tokens anymore, the trade tax is set at 40%, you will simply lose your money, the only legitimate token is now $BCBInformation about the WORLD CUP INU token:Name: WORLD CUP INUSymbol: WCIDecimals: 9Total Supply: 1,000,000,000Circulating Supply: 982,350,000Contract https://etherscan.io/token/0xc5a9bc46a7dbe1c6de493e84a18f02e70e2c5a32TokenomicsBUY / SELL has 5% Tax each. Out of which:4% goes to Marketing / Development. 1% goes to LP (Liquidity Provider) which is locked for 4 YearsThe WCI token was created in September 2022 and is intended for betting on football matches on the PVP platform Create an account or just connect your wallet and place bets in $WCI tokens or the cryptocurrency you have chosen for exchangeMinimum Deposits and withdrawals: WORLD CUP INU (WCI) - 15000Marshall Inu (MRI) - 500Bitcoin - 0.0001Ethereum - 0.005USDT - 10Terms and Conditions https://wcibets.com/pages/termsAs well as on the WCI Leverage on-chain betting platform with x3 leverage(is Live)In addition, the WCI team offers its own sports token data aggregator, an analogue of CMC called WCI SportswatchThe release of the NFT collection SHIBS OF FOOTBALL created by the WCI is scheduled for November 13The WCI token was supported by famous footballers: Ronaldinho, Arturo Vidal, Daniel Alves, Luis Suárez, Pedro Guilherme, Ivan RakiticExchanges and Guides & Contract LinksCoinMarketCap $WCIDextools $WCICoinGecko $WCIUniswapBKEXLbankBitMartPhemexGuidesETH ContractWCI BETS ON-CHAINWCI BETS PVPWCI SportswatchOfficial Website and Social Media Links:  Website | Telegram Official Group | Twitter | Twitter WCINFT | Telegram Announcement | Discord   Instagram  | YoutubeATTENTION The $WCI team does not and is not going to conduct any Aidrop in the future. Be careful and extremely careful when interacting with contracts, several people have already lost their funds. ALL AIRDROP $WCI SCAM

Adding advanced bets2. Users can create rooms to place bets on events: The winner of the match (including and excluding a draw), Over/Under, Asian Handicap, Handicap for the 1st half, Goal Line of the 1st half, Half time result and will be expanded in the future.https://twitter.com/wcierc20/status/1590192074892410880

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: During the Verona — Juventus Serie A match, an advertisement for $WCI was broadcast at the stadium, let's hope that this will help the $WCI team promote the popularity of the token.https://twitter.com/wcierc20/status/1590774263916957696Also, $WCI already has endorsements from 2 players playing in the upcoming Qatar WC, these are Dani Alves of the Brazilian national team and Luis Suarez of the national team| Uruguay.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: The Sports Leverage platform is launched with the sports leverage platform, users can place bets using multipliers 2 and 3, that is, the user's bet amount will be 2 or 3 times the original bet amount.To use the leverage platform, users must deposit collateral tokens. You can do this on the additional page of the site https://wcibets.club / just by connecting your wallet for example MetaMaskThere are 4 types of collateral tokens (USDT, USDC, SHIB and DOGE), and you can also deposit ethers as collateral. Source: https://t.me/Worldcupinuofficial/539249After you have made several deposits, you can try betting with multipliers.Let's say you have deposited 0.1 ether, 20 USDT, 20 USDC, 2,000,000 SHIB and 2000 DOGE and are trying to put 0.2 ether using a multiplier of 3.First, the system checks whether you have enough collateral for this bet.This is done by calculating the total cost of tokens in the ether.It uses the price of the uniswap token and calculates the value of all tokens in the ether using these token prices.Let's say the price of USDT is 0.001 ether, the price of USDC is 0.001 ether, the price of SHIB is 0.000001 ether, and the price of DOGE is 0.0001 ether.Then the total cost of these tokens will be 0,001 * 20 + 0,001 * 20 + 0,00000001 * 2,000,000 + 0,0001 * 2000 = 0,26 ether.The amount of your deposit is 0.36 ether, because you also deposited 0.1 ether.Since the amount of your bet is 0.1 and the multiplier is 2, the deposit amount must be at least 0.2.Your deposit amount is 0.36, so you can place bets.If your deposit amount is less than 0.2, you cannot bet 0.1 multiplied by 3.After you have placed a bet, some tokens are blocked. You cannot withdraw these blocked tokens.The number of blocking tokens is calculated as follows.The cost of each token is calculated on the air.0.1 ether = 0.1 ether20 US dollars = 0.02 ether20 US dollars = 0.02 ether2000000 shib = 0.02 ether2000 doge = 0.2 etherAnd these amounts are summed up until it reaches 0.2.Because 0,1 + 0,02 + 0,02 + 0,02 + 0,04 = 0,2, an amount equivalent to these amounts of ether will be blocked.That is, 0.1 ether, 20 usdt, 20 usdc, 2000000 shib and 400 dodge will be locked.The cost of tokens is calculated in the order of ETH, USDT, USDC, SHIB and DOGE.If you win the bet, these tokens will be unlocked and you will receive the same earnings as 0.6 ether.If you lose the bet, you will also lose these collateral tokens.You can also use this platform to securely store your tokens.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Dev informs that Certik will audit the $WCI token contract, NFT contract will be verified by tech-rate. Also, the NFT contract is planned to be deployed today and launch Dapps, however, minting NFT will be postponed for 2-3 days.Source: https://t.me/Worldcupinuofficial/551961            https://t.me/Worldcupinuofficial/551272To view the last AMA on Binance Live, follow the link https://www.binance.com/en/live/video?roomId=2112668

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: A small report from the developers about what has already been done and what needs to be done -The legality is sorted, now the WCI is fully legally confirmed -Tech rate smart contract audit is ready(https://t.me/Worldcupinuofficial/553669) , and Certik coming soon.- Billboards of Dubai- LED advertising in Juventus- Phemex listing announced- The Sports Leverage platform has been launched.- Advance rates have been added in the update.- Two of our assistants are playing at the World Cup.- The next cex and player confirmed Also $WCI will be used for online betting in all major football leagues, world championships in various sports, NFL, baseball, boxing and even possibly horse racing.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Update regarding NFT SHIB's of football minting from $WCI: Official link for minting  https://mint.worldcupinu.app/live on Opensea  https://opensea.io/collection/shibs-of-football-by-wci-Phase 1 - CHADList MintThe mint price is 0.05 ETHStart - November 17 - 11 am UTCEnds - November 18 - 1 pm UTC Users registered in @CHADList Role users from $WCI Discord can mint up to 20 NFT to a walletPhase 2 - Mint of $WCI holdersThe mint price is 0.05 ETHStarts - 18th November - 4 pm UTC Ends - 19th November - 1 pm UTCAny users  who holds 5,000 $WCI and above can mint up to 10 NFTs per WalletPhase 3 - Public RoundMint Price - 0.06 ETHStarts - 19th November - 2 pm UTCEnds - 20th November - 12 am UTCPublic Mint will be initiated if there are any NFT left from Phase 1 or 2

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Who minted NFT SHIB's of football from $WCI could notice that the collection on OpenSea is not displayed and gives an error, according to dev, although the NFT contract was verified by Techrate, but as it turned out, the commission recipient seems to have been compromised, which led to the loss of 58 eth from mint money. Dev reimburses the losses from its funds and deploys a new NFT contract, in which users who have installed NFT will receive NFT with the same ID. I myself participated in the #1 minting phase and screwed 20 NFT SHIB's of football from $WCI, we are waiting for the minting to continue. This is what the transfer of NFT development to third parties leads to, I hope everything will be resolved in the best way, by the way, about 2000 NFT out of a total of 10k were minted at the first stage.Source: https://t.me/Worldcupinuofficial/585836QuoteHi everyone,So I would like to start off with “ FUNDS ARE SAFU” . As you may know our NFT contract is audited by Techrate (see below for full audit), yet our fee receiver seems to have been compromised, resulting in the loss of 58 eth from mint money (exact cause to be confirmed). I have the fee receiver on a separate new computer, which I think was compromised during exchange with the NFT dev.1) I will refund the ETH to the jackpot from my PERSONAL FUNDS2) I’m in contact with known devs suggested by trusted sources to redeploy the contract3) If you minted you will be airdropped the same NFTS (same token ID)4) Your funds are SAFU as I coded the dapp myself5) New fee receiver will be a physical ledgerI’m sorry for the turn of events. I’m glad this happened early during the mint with an amount I can cover.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: The fee recipient was topped up with personal funds dev wallet address https://etherscan.io/search?f=0&q=0xCa99f437DE3Af9879b58ea9aD8d856c4b586FFAc minting is currently in phase 2 .For those who have already mint NFT have been replaced with new ones from the updated contract, all holders of more than $5,000WCI for 10 NFT can now mint. The beginning of the public minting of NFT SHIB's of football minting from $WCI will begin in 7 hours at a price of $0.06 eth If someone has problems with minting on smartphones, then you can do it at the following link https://mint.worldcupinu.app/mint/ https://t.me/Worldcupinuofficial/600319https://t.me/Worldcupinuofficial/591158https://t.me/Worldcupinuofficial/593762

Implemented referral and dashboard. (Now users can offer and earn when their referrals place bets on the platform.)2. A dashboard has appeared, with which you can see the total amount of the bet, as well as the total amount of winnings.https://t.me/Worldcupinuofficial/631420

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: A few statistics of the betting platform: On the world's first decentralized sports lever platform, for only one game Portugal vs Ghana, the amount of bets was $32,000, and the volume of one match alone was $64,000. A total of $30,000 was bet on the Brazil vs Serbia match, the volume of the match is $60,000. Today's total volume of bets on the WCI is more than $140,000At the same time, in 90% of cases, the odds on $WCI bets were higher than any other bookmaker, well, in any case, dev $WCI thinks so.https://twitter.com/wcierc20/status/1595822463715532802https://twitter.com/wcierc20/status/1595856379897868288

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Unfortunately, the price of the $WCI token continued its decline over the past week, the tactics of holding a competition among buy may have led to the token rolling down to the "pump & dump" coin  , although dev is very actively working, the next shilling @wcinft contest ended today and the winners were announced https://t.me/Worldcupinuofficial/669012
